SEARCH
程序包 com.shapeville.gui.shapes

类 ShapeDrawer

java.lang.Object
com.shapeville.gui.shapes.ShapeDrawer
public class ShapeDrawer extends Object
The ShapeDrawer class provides static methods for drawing various geometric shapes with dimensions and measurements. It supports drawing rectangles, parallelograms, triangles, and trapeziums with customizable colors and dimension labels.
从以下版本开始:
2025-05-01
版本:
1.0
作者:
Ye Jin, Jian Wang, Zijie Long, Tianyun Zhang, Xianzhi Dong

  • 方法详细资料

    • drawRectangle

      public static void drawRectangle(Graphics2D g2d, int x, int y, int width, int height, Map<String,Double> params, boolean showDimensions)
      Draws a rectangle with optional dimension labels.
      参数:
      g2d - Graphics2D context to draw on
      x - X-coordinate of the top-left corner
      y - Y-coordinate of the top-left corner
      width - Width of the rectangle
      height - Height of the rectangle
      params - Map containing dimension parameters ("长" for length, "宽" for width)
      showDimensions - Whether to show dimension labels

    • drawParallelogram

      public static void drawParallelogram(Graphics2D g2d, int x, int y, int width, int height, int offset, Map<String,Double> params, boolean showDimensions)
      Draws a parallelogram with optional dimension labels.
      参数:
      g2d - Graphics2D context to draw on
      x - X-coordinate of the bottom-left corner
      y - Y-coordinate of the top point
      width - Width of the parallelogram
      height - Height of the parallelogram
      offset - Horizontal offset for the top edge
      params - Map containing dimension parameters ("底" for base, "高" for height)
      showDimensions - Whether to show dimension labels

    • drawTriangle

      public static void drawTriangle(Graphics2D g2d, int centerX, int centerY, int base, int height, Map<String,Double> params, boolean showDimensions)
      Draws a triangle with optional dimension labels.
      参数:
      g2d - Graphics2D context to draw on
      centerX - X-coordinate of the triangle's center
      centerY - Y-coordinate of the triangle's center
      base - Length of the triangle's base
      height - Height of the triangle
      params - Map containing dimension parameters ("底" for base, "高" for height)
      showDimensions - Whether to show dimension labels

    • drawTrapezium

      public static void drawTrapezium(Graphics2D g2d, int centerX, int centerY, int topWidth, int bottomWidth, int height, Map<String,Double> params, boolean showDimensions)
      Draws a trapezium (trapezoid) with optional dimension labels.
      参数:
      g2d - Graphics2D context to draw on
      centerX - X-coordinate of the trapezium's center
      centerY - Y-coordinate of the trapezium's center
      topWidth - Width of the top parallel side
      bottomWidth - Width of the bottom parallel side
      height - Height of the trapezium
      params - Map containing dimension parameters ("上底" for top base, "下底" for bottom base, "高" for height)
      showDimensions - Whether to show dimension labels
